blogPost.excerpt: Snazzy AI is the fastest, highest quality, GPT-3 powered app on the market. Through a combination of best in class tech from OpenAI and our own ML layer you can quickly create any type of content you can image. And even better, we have a forever free plan.
blogPost.body: Snazzy AI is the fastest, highest quality, GPT-3 powered app on the market. Through a combination of best in class tech from OpenAI and our own ML layer you can quickly create any type of content you can image. And even better, we have a forever free plan.
blogPost.title: Snazzy AI - AI-powered content creation. Free for everyone.
blogPost.author: Chris Frantz

localize.description: Snazzy AI是市场上速度最快、质量最高、由GPT-3驱动的应用。通过结合OpenAI的一流技术和我们自己的ML层，你可以快速创建任何类型的内容，你可以想象。更妙的是，我们有一个永远免费的计划。
localize.tagline: AI驱动的内容创作。人人免费。

localize.description: Snazzy AI是市場上速度最快、質量最高、由GPT-3驅動的應用。通過結合OpenAI的一流技術和我們自己的ML層，你可以快速創建任何類型的內容，你可以想象。更妙的是，我們有一個永遠免費的計劃。
localize.tagline: AI驅動的內容創作。人人免費。

previous.excerpt: Alt lets you treat your sports card collection as an investment portfolio. You can buy and sell pre-authenticated cards on our exchange and track the current market value for all your assets with our integrated portfolio management view.
previous.title: Alt - Invest in sports cards just like stocks

localize.description: Alt让您把您的运动卡收藏当作一个投资组合。您可以在我们的交易所购买和出售预认证卡，并通过我们的综合投资组合管理视图跟踪您所有资产的当前市场价值。
localize.tagline: 投资体育卡就像投资股票一样

localize.description: Alt讓您把您的運動卡收藏當作一個投資組合。您可以在我們的交易所購買和出售預認證卡，並通過我們的綜合投資組合管理視圖跟蹤您所有資產的當前市場價值。
localize.tagline: 投資體育卡就像投資股票一樣

next.excerpt: Better collaboration for product teams in multiple time zones. Exchange video, voice, and screen recordings with your team at the tap of a button.
next.title: PingPong - Video messaging for remote teams

localize.description: 为多时区的产品团队提供更好的协作。只需轻点按钮，即可与您的团队交换视频、语音和屏幕记录。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的视频信息传递

localize.description: 爲多時區的產品團隊提供更好的協作。只需輕點按鈕，即可與您的團隊交換視頻、語音和屏幕記錄。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的視頻信息傳遞
